## Vector3.abs() method

Calculates the absolute values of a Vector3.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static abs(a: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The input vector. |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector (can be the same vector as a or b). if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The output vector
